content: the suzette stitch mug cozy is an easy quick pattern for a lovely textured mug cozy to keep your hot drink warmer for longer the suzette stitch also called grit or thicket stitch is a pretty textured stitch pattern that is super easy to make it is also easy to adapt for other sizes this pattern is written using us crochet terminology **skill level ** easy **recommended yarn** aran or worsted #4 weight acrylic/wool/blend yarn approximately 33-37 yards/ 31m-34m 0 64oz/18g hooks & other materials us size h 5 0mm yarn needle stitch marker button approx 1 /2 5cm **sizes/finished measurements** approx 10 x 3 25 5 cm x 7 5cm this pattern has been tested for errors but should you have any problems please send me a message through ravelry **are you on my email list ** i offer exclusive discounts on new pattern releases for my email subscribers and you ll always hear of any offers and events i m taking part in if you would like to join just click below join email list 1 **note on selling items and copyright** the pattern and all images are copyright janferie mackintosh all rights reserved please do not copy or share any part of this document you may print it for your own use please do not alter it and try to claim it as your own pattern you may not use photographs of this pattern without permission you may not make tutorial videos from this pattern you may sell finished items handmade in small quantities by you design credit is appreciated thank you **please note that instant download pdfs files cannot be refunded ** 1 https //thecraftytherapist com/subscribe/
